nodes.text: The Imperial Era began in 31 BBY (12,689 Tapani calendar) and ended in 4 ABY (112,724 Tapani calendar). It was the period of time when Palpatine established the Galactic Empire and House Pelagia was purged of its House Jedi. Due to the year the Imperial Era began in, it was not aligned with the formal Declaration of a New Order.
